comments.body: Can you also make apiserver A and apiserver B to have different encoding version, and then verify that after idA is deleted, the commonEncodingVersion is set?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@		assertStorageVersionEntries(t, kubeclient, 2, idA)
		assertCommonEncodingVersion(t, kubeclient, nil)
		deleteTestAPIServerIdentityLease(t, kubeclient, idA)
		assertStorageVersionEntries(t, kubeclient, 1, idB)
		assertCommonEncodingVersion(t, kubeclient, pointer.StringPtr(idToVersion(t, idB)))
